summary:
This is a standalone follower mod. You don't need other mods.
she is staying at Frostfruis Inn (Roriksted)
descriptionHtml:
[img width=603,height=353]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85312-2-1500024282.png[/img]
This is a standalone follower mod. You don't need other mods.
she is staying at Frostfruis Inn (Roriksted)

[size=5]Synopsis：[/size]
The brave "Gtein" who defends the peace of the universe
confronts the huge evil lurking in the sky rim!
Do not lose! Gtein!
Fight! Space Hero Gtein!


"Belko" Friend of Gtein
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62149/?][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85312-0-1501072002.png[/img][/url]

[size=5]Requirements:[/size]
The latest version of Skyrim.
and Latest Update.

[size=5]Combat:[/size]
One handed mace and shield
She will beat her enemies with shield and mace with full power.

[size=5]Recommended Mods:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/]Face Light by tktk1[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304/]SIZE DOES MATTER - NPCs do not rescale shrink resize - less camera restrictions by Mahlzeit88[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url]

[size=5]Change Log:[/size]

Ver.2.0
another version of Gtein.
Please overwrite it and use it. Or you can use this file only.

This data uses "saLaHair 1.1" made by tktk.
I understood at first sight the ideal hairstyle data!
Thank you very much, tktk=san & saLa=san.

Ver.1.15
From Ver.1.14, furthermore,
fixed the missing part of nif data.
I am grateful to the user who taught me.

Ver.1.14
Fine Adjustment & Change tint file
which was not well utilized so that it looks good.

Ver.1.13
Fix that tint file was not adapted.
Especially big changes may not be seen...?

Ver.1.12
I divided the internal diary data with another esp file

Ver.1.11
Secretly fix mouse texture

ver.1.1
"Invulnerable mode" release,
Status change Health:600! Stamina:1200!
Because it is a space hero!
skin texture msn file change.（The data volume became slightly heavy · · ·）
Englishization of esp file.

ver.1.0
It is MOD I made for the first time.
Although there may be various failures, I will try to fix it each time!

[size=5]G!Diary:[/size][color=#f9cb9c]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.2.0[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color]
[color=#ffffff]It is the last data of the diary.
I would like to thank the people who read until the end![/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.9
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#ffffff]Newly added 4 diaries[/color][/color][/color]
[color=#ffffff]The next will be the final Ver![/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.8
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#ffffff]Newly added 4 diaries

[/color][/color][color=#ffffff]I should have said earlier,
but if the characters in the diary in the game are hard to see,
there are picture data files in the following places,
so you should be able to read it somehow by opening it with Photo Viewer etc.[/color]

Data\textures\interface\books\gdiary

[color=#ffffff]I think it is difficult to translate because it is handwritten in Japanese,
but it may be a chance to get in touch with someone who wants to
become a friend who understands Japanese who live in the neighborhood.
[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.7
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#ffffff]Newly added 3 diaries
and 1 note.[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.6
[/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#ffffff]The number of diaries has now become 20 volumes.
Probably the other half![/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.5
Newly added 4 diaries![/color][/color][/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.4
Newly added 2 diaries.[/color][/color]
[color=#ffffff]The waiting time for the upload gradually became longer ...[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Ver.1.[color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]3
[/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]Newly added 2 diaries.[/color][/color]
[color=#ffffff]And since it was found disarranged pages
in 4 volumes, 5 volumes, it was corrected.[/color]

[color=#ffffff]Ver.1.2
Newly added 2 diaries.[/color]

[color=#ffffff]Ver.1.1
Fixed tree structure of data file. Newly added 2 diaries.
[/color][color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]If you have downloaded the previous version, [/color]
we recommend uninstalling once and then installing the latest version.[/color]

[color=#ffffff]Ver.1.0
Experimentally set up 4 diaries in Frost Fruit Inn.[/color]
[/color]
[size=5]Credit:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?/]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60111/?]Cherry's Eyes by [b]CherryMods[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D68311%26preview%3D&pUp=1]KS Hairdos [b]by [/b][b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?]Cloaks of Skyrimby [b]by Noodles[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS by [b]xp32
saLaHair by saLa and tktk[/b][/url]
and Skyrim by Bethesda

I greatly appreciate the above peoples!
author: moriposn
